article: spurred by a pledge of $ ## million from warren e. buffett , the billionaire investor and philanthropist , the board of the international atomic energy agency voted friday to set up a global nuclear fuel bank that aspiring nations can turn to for reactor fuel instead of making it themselves .
abstract: buffett helps u.n. agency create nuclear fuel bank
